00058 #if !defined(AFX_SERVICEREGISTER_H__EE7AC432_E4CE_4735_B5E5_6A2EC8A090F3__INCLUDED_)
00059 #define AFX_SERVICEREGISTER_H__EE7AC432_E4CE_4735_B5E5_6A2EC8A090F3__INCLUDED_
00060 
00061 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00062 #pragma once
00063 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00064 
00065 #include "DataBlockWriterClass.h"
00066 #include "DataBlockReaderClass.h"
00067 #include "Module.h"
00068 #include "Handler.h"
00069 #include "ModuleImpl.h"
00070 
00071 namespace SystemsBiologyWorkbench
00072 {
00073 
00078 template <class T> class MethodTable  
00079 {
00080 public:
00087         MethodTable(ModuleImpl &mi, T *s, std::string name) : moduleImpl(mi), service(s), serviceName(name) {}
00088 
00090         typedef DataBlockWriter (T:: * Method) (Module from, DataBlockReader reader);
00091 
00093         class TemplateHandler : public Handler  
00094         {
00095         public:
00101                 TemplateHandler(T *s, Method m): service(s), method(m) {};
00102 
00109                 virtual DataBlockWriter receive(Module from, DataBlockReader reader) 
00110                 {
00111                         return (service->*method)(from, reader);
00112                 }
00113 
00114         private:
00116                 T *service;
00117 
00119                 Method method;
00120         };
00121 
00129         void addMethod(Method method, std::string signature, bool synchronized = false, std::string help = "")
00130         {
00131                 moduleImpl.setHandler(serviceName, new TemplateHandler(service, method), signature, synchronized, help);
00132         }
00133 
00134 private:
00136         ModuleImpl &moduleImpl;
00137 
00139         std::string serviceName;
00140 
00142         T *service;
00143 };
00144 
00145 } // SystemsBiologyWorkbench
00146 
00147 #endif // !defined(AFX_SERVICEREGISTER_H__EE7AC432_E4CE_4735_B5E5_6A2EC8A090F3__INCLUDED_)
